availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Rockcastle County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Newcomb Lanford. Father of Adaline Langford, Stephen Langford, Robert Langford, Miriam Jane Langford, Rebecca Langford, Martha F. Langford, Nancy A. Langford, Moses Langford, Eliza M. Langford, Sarah E. Langford, Lavina Langford, Emily Langford, and Mary M. Langford. Farmer in Rockcastle County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Rockcastle County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, Northern District, p. 187A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, p. 574.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, District 1, p. 29B.
Sons of the American Revolution Membership Applications, 1889-1970, National Society of the Sons of the American Revolution, Louisville, KY, National 39385, State 410.
